<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. For more details, visit https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization#_use-a-githubcopilotinstructionsmd-file -->
- This is a React frontend project built with Vite and TypeScript for startup prototype building and market research.
- Use TypeScript for all new code.
- Follow React best practices and hooks.
- Components are in src/components/.
- Styles can be added with CSS modules or Tailwind if installed.
- Focus on adding features for idea validation, prototyping, and market analysis.
